spawn_agent.description: Spawn a new OfficeCowork agent to handle a specific task asynchronously in a shared workspace. All spawned agents run in the background for parallel execution. Useful for complex task decomposition and parallel execution.

task_description.description: Description of the task for the new OfficeCowork agent

agent_id.description: Custom agent ID (optional, will auto-generate if not provided). Must match format 'agent_XXX' where XXX is a 3-digit number

api_key.description: API key for the new agent (optional, will use current if not provided)

model.description: Model name for the new agent (optional, will use current if not provided)

max_loops.description: Maximum execution loops for the new agent (default: 25)

MCP_config_file.description: Custom MCP configuration file path (optional, defaults to 'config/mcp_servers.json')

prompts_folder.description: Custom prompts folder path (optional, defaults to 'prompts'). Allows using different prompt templates and tool interfaces

send_P2P_message.description: Send a peer-to-peer (P2P) message to a specific agent or manager for direct communication. Use 'manager' as receiver_id to send messages to the manager. The content parameter is REQUIRED and must be provided as a string or object.

receiver_id.description: Target agent ID to send message to (use 'manager' for manager)

content.description: Message content as string. This is a REQUIRED parameter. Example: 'Hello, please respond to this message' or 'Task completed successfully'

send_broadcast_message.description: Send a message to all active agents in the system. The content parameter is REQUIRED and must be provided as a string.

content.description: Message content as string. This is a REQUIRED parameter. Example: 'System maintenance in 5 minutes' or 'All agents please report status'

get_agent_session_info.description: Get comprehensive information about current agent session including session statistics, agent details, and list of all active agents.

terminate_agent.description: Terminate a specific OfficeCowork agent. Use 'self' or leave agent_id empty to terminate current agent. This sends a terminate signal to the agent, causing it to stop execution and clean up resources.

agent_id.description: ID of the agent to terminate. Use 'self' or leave empty to terminate current agent.
